scripts.validate:flutter: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('flutter --version', {stdio: 'ignore'}); require('child_process').execSync('cd frontend/app && flutter analyze && flutter test', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch(e) { console.log('Flutter not found or validation failed. Skipping mobile validation. CI will check this later.'); }"
scripts.validate: pnpm run validate:js && pnpm run validate:flutter
